programmes.show_description: Tempers flare as Parks Towing takes on a high-pressure truck recovery from the bottom of a steep gully in the snowy mountains of Canterbury, New Zealand.
Reality series. Todd has the dubious honour of hauling the heaviest load in Polar Industries' history, but the roads are not about to make his job any easier.
On the busy A1, halfway between Newcastle and Durham, an articulated lorry has fallen down a 20-metre embankment. The Alpha Recovery crew must work out how to retrieve the truck.
Sean tackles a telehandler that's flipped over in a very muddy garden. How will he and his team safely lift it out to get it back to the depot? And a sunken car gets into deep trouble.

A daily round-up of showbiz news and gossip from around the world, focusing on celebrities, movies, music and entertainment.
Patrol officer Malek Badeer stops a car with a dangerous DIY repair job, and patrol man Matt Rugel's routine traffic stop proves unfortunate for a wanted man.
Observational documentary series. Jenno joins a TPAC-takedown of a man suspected to be armed, and Steve rushes to help a pregnant lady caught up in a three-car smash.
Observational documentary series. Jenno and Bucko race to assist when Jim is rammed by a runaway driver, and a have-a-go hero helps to tackle a runaway drug driver.
Sean uses the big red key to give a drug dealer a door knock he won't forget, and Jim chases down a speeding driver which leads to some drug-related discoveries.
Jacko is on the hunt for a wanted teenager, and the interceptors are hot on the heels of a stolen silver Micra.
Presenters Rick Edwards and Ortis Delay are out with the police interceptors as they tackle the difficult night shift.
New Jersey police crack down on reckless driving. A cop is called to an exploding minibus and attends a three-car crash on one of the state's most dangerous roads. (Ep1)
PCs Ian and Matt pull over a Chevvy. A search of the vehicle reveals drugs paraphernalia. In Warrington, cops the hunt for an uninsured driver who may be drunk.
Western starring Alan Ladd and Mona Freeman. A gunman poses as a wealthy rancher's long-lost son in an attempt to steal his fortune. (1951)

When British police learn of Pieter Tritton's drug empire, he is forced to go on the run, but he can't resist collecting one final shipment of cocaine.
Matthew Schrier is kidnapped in Syria by Al Qaeda, but when the opportunity to escape arises, will he save himself or stay with his fellow American prisoner?
Teenager Simone Blignaut is in Bolivia to secure a major cocaine deal when she's double-crossed - now she must evade capture.
Journalist Phil Cox is investigating allegations of illegally deployed chemical weapons when he's taken hostage.

Near the junction to East Midlands airport, a trailer sheds its load and causes rush hour chaos. Adam dispatches a crack team of his finest recovery ops.
A 20-tonne digger has been written off after it fell into the Thames. Rory is dispatched to rescue a Sprinter which is blocking a bus lane.
Reality series. With Todd and his rival Darrell on the same route, will they manage to keep things professional? Polar boss Mark throws a newbie in at the deep end.
Reality series. Ice road rookie Mike attempts his first solo delivery; Polar's top dog Todd Dewey runs into trouble and truck problems slow Art's season to a halt.
Reality series. The consequences are huge when Darrell's truck breaks down. Plus, Mike Simmons' inexperience costs him on tough winter roads.
Reality series. Art struggles to negotiate a melting ice crossing, Alex faces a mud-covered mountain, and Lisa and Darrell put their company's future on the line.
Reality series. Todd must think outside the box, Alex races against the clock, and just getting home proves a struggle for Darrell and Lisa.

Clayton's Towing tackles a devastating 80-tonne crane collapse, Wagga Towing recovers a rolled B-double, and Parks Towing attend to a stolen car recovery in boulder-ridden Port Hills. (Ep6)
